text:
Sentry | http://getsentry.com | Full-time in San Francisco

Come help us develop our open source exception monitoring service: http://github.com/getsentry/sentry.

Sentry is a small team (just 13 people) with a beloved product, a long list of notable customers, strong and growing revenue, and a commitment to open source.

We've just opened up positions for a bunch of important roles:

* Node.js Engineer

* Mobile Platform Lead

* Infrastructure Engineer

* Support Engineer

* Product Engineer (Front-end, React)

* Customer Success

* Community and Events

You can find more about our roles here: http://getsentry.com/jobs, or reach out to me directly to find out more: ben (at) getsentry.com.
